sample.title: OpenAI launches newsroom automation toolkit
sample.author: Jamie Rivera
sample.content: OpenAI announced a newsroom automation toolkit aimed at helping local journalism outlets create daily digests. The toolkit integrates with existing content management systems and offers AI-assisted summarization. Early partners in New York City say the pilot improved newsroom throughput without sacrificing editorial oversight.

sample.title: Local climate desk expands community data partnerships
sample.author: Priya Das
sample.content: The Metro Climate Desk is expanding partnerships with universities to gather hyperlocal climate data. Community scientists in Brooklyn and Queens will deploy low-cost sensors to track air quality hotspots. Organizers believe the initiative will give policymakers better insights while keeping residents engaged.
